verbose_text: In the mouse model of concanavalin A (Con A) induced liver injury (mimics many aspects of human AIH), in which early innate immune activation (i.e., stimulated hepatic macrophages / monocytes recruit neutrophils and additional monocytes to the liver) critically drives immune mediated hepatitis induction, mirtazapine strikingly and dose-dependently inhibited Con A induced liver injury.
evidence: concanavalin A (Con A) induced liver injury
